fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
This contains the most recent Default Snapshot for the Competency. This is set on the Configure Competency page in the UI, and is not tied to any specific Band.
This contains the information about each specific Competency Band. Each one is tied to a specific management level or compensation grade.
